00020 /*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022   sc_hash.cpp -- Implementation of a chained hash table with MTF
00023                  (move-to-front).
00024 
00025   Original Author: Stan Y. Liao, Synopsys, Inc.
00026 
00027   CHANGE LOG AT END OF FILE
00028  *****************************************************************************/
00029 
00030 #ifndef SC_HASH_H
00031 #define SC_HASH_H
00032 
00033 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_simcontext.h"
00034 
00035 namespace sc_core {
00036 
00037 extern SC_API unsigned default_int_hash_fn(const void*);
00038 extern SC_API unsigned default_ptr_hash_fn(const void*);
00039 extern SC_API unsigned default_str_hash_fn(const void*);
00040 
00041 class sc_phash_elem;
00042 class sc_phash_base_iter;
00043 template<class K, class C>  //template class
00044 class sc_pdhash_iter;       //decl. -- Amit
00045 
00046 const int    PHASH_DEFAULT_MAX_DENSITY     = 5;
00047 const int    PHASH_DEFAULT_INIT_TABLE_SIZE = 11;
00048 extern SC_API const double PHASH_DEFAULT_GROW_FACTOR;
00049 const bool   PHASH_DEFAULT_REORDER_FLAG    = true;
00050 
00051 class SC_API sc_phash_base {
00052     friend class sc_phash_base_iter;
00053 
00054     typedef sc_phash_base_iter iterator;
00055 
00056 public:
00057     typedef unsigned (*hash_fn_t)(const void*);
00058     typedef int (*cmpr_fn_t)(const void*, const void*);
00059 
00060 protected:
00061     void*    default_value;
00062     int      num_bins;
00063     int      num_entries;
00064     int      max_density;
00065     int      reorder_flag;
00066     double   grow_factor;
00067 
00068     sc_phash_elem** bins;
00069 
00070     hash_fn_t hash;
00071     cmpr_fn_t cmpr;
00072 
00073     void rehash();
00074     unsigned do_hash(const void* key) const { return (*hash)(key) % num_bins; }
00075 
00076     sc_phash_elem* add_direct(void* key, void* contents, unsigned hash_val);
00077     sc_phash_elem* find_entry_c(unsigned hv, const void* k, sc_phash_elem*** plast);
00078     sc_phash_elem* find_entry_q(unsigned hv, const void* k, sc_phash_elem*** plast);
00079     sc_phash_elem* find_entry(unsigned hv, const void* k, sc_phash_elem*** plast=0) const
00080     {
00081       /* Got rid of member func. pointer and replaced with if-else  */
00082       /* Amit (5/14/99)                                             */
00083       if( cmpr == 0 )
00084         return ((sc_phash_base*)this)->find_entry_q( hv, k, plast );
00085       else
00086         return ((sc_phash_base*)this)->find_entry_c( hv, k, plast );
00087     }
00088 
00089 public:
00090     sc_phash_base( void* def       = 0,
00091                    int    size     = PHASH_DEFAULT_INIT_TABLE_SIZE,
00092                    int    density  = PHASH_DEFAULT_MAX_DENSITY,
00093                    double grow     = PHASH_DEFAULT_GROW_FACTOR,
00094                    bool   reorder  = PHASH_DEFAULT_REORDER_FLAG,
00095                    hash_fn_t hash_fn = default_ptr_hash_fn,
00096                    cmpr_fn_t cmpr_fn = 0                             );
00097     ~sc_phash_base();
00098 
00099     void set_cmpr_fn(cmpr_fn_t);
00100     void set_hash_fn(hash_fn_t);
00101 
00102     bool empty() const { return (num_entries == 0); }
00103     unsigned count() const { return num_entries; }
00104 
00105     void erase();
00106     void erase(void (*kfree)(void*));
00107     void copy( const sc_phash_base* );
00108     void copy( const sc_phash_base& b ) { copy(&b); }
00109     void copy( const sc_phash_base& b, void* (*kdup)(const void*), void (*kfree)(void*));
00110     int insert( void* k, void* c );
00111     int insert( void* k ) { return insert(k, default_value); }
00112     int insert( void* k, void* c, void* (*kdup)(const void*) );
00113     int insert_if_not_exists(void* k, void* c);
00114     int insert_if_not_exists(void* k) { return insert_if_not_exists(k, default_value); }
00115     int insert_if_not_exists(void* k, void* c, void* (*kdup)(const void*));
00116     int remove(const void* k);
00117     int remove(const void* k, void** pk, void** pc);
00118     int remove(const void* k, void (*kfree)(void*));
00119     int remove_by_contents(const void* c);
00120     int remove_by_contents(bool (*predicate)(const void*, void*), void* arg);
00121     int remove_by_contents(const void* c, void (*kfree)(void*));
00122     int remove_by_contents(bool (*predicate)(const void*, void*), void* arg, void (*kfree)(void*));
00123     int lookup(const void* k, void** pc) const;
00124     bool contains(const void* k) const { return (lookup(k, 0) != 0); }
00125     void* operator[](const void* key) const;
00126 };
00127 
00128 class SC_API sc_phash_base_iter {
00129 protected:
00130     sc_phash_base*  table;
00131     sc_phash_elem*  entry;
00132     sc_phash_elem*  next;
00133     sc_phash_elem** last;
00134     int             index;
00135 
00136 public:
00137     void reset(sc_phash_base* t);
00138     void reset(sc_phash_base& t) { reset(&t); }
00139 
00140     sc_phash_base_iter(sc_phash_base* t)
00141     : table(t), entry(0), next(0), last(0), index(0)
00142         { reset(t); }
00143     sc_phash_base_iter(sc_phash_base& t)
00144     : table(&t), entry(0), next(0), last(0), index(0)
00145         { reset(t); }
00146     ~sc_phash_base_iter() { }
00147 
00148     bool empty() const;
00149     void step();
00150     void operator++(int) { step(); }
00151     void remove();
00152     void remove(void (*kfree)(void*));
00153     void* key() const;
00154     void* contents() const;
00155     void* set_contents(void* c);
00156 };
00157 
00158 template< class K, class C >
00159 class sc_phash_iter;
00160 
00161 template< class K, class C >
00162 class sc_phash : public sc_phash_base {
00163     friend class sc_phash_iter<K,C>;
00164 
00165 public:
00166     typedef sc_phash_iter<K,C> iterator;
00167 
00168     sc_phash( C def = (C) 0,
00169               int size    = PHASH_DEFAULT_INIT_TABLE_SIZE,
00170               int density = PHASH_DEFAULT_MAX_DENSITY,
00171               double grow = PHASH_DEFAULT_GROW_FACTOR,
00172               bool reorder = PHASH_DEFAULT_REORDER_FLAG,
00173               hash_fn_t hash_fn = default_ptr_hash_fn,
00174               cmpr_fn_t cmpr_fn = 0                          )
00175         : sc_phash_base((void*) def, size, density, grow, reorder, hash_fn, cmpr_fn) { }
00176     ~sc_phash() { }
00177 
00178     void copy(const sc_phash<K,C>* b) { sc_phash_base::copy(b); }
00179     void copy(const sc_phash<K,C>& b) { sc_phash_base::copy(b); }
00180     void copy(const sc_phash<K,C>& b, void* (*kdup)(const void*), void (*kfree)(void*)) { sc_phash_base::copy(b, kdup, kfree); }
00181 
00182     int insert(K k, C c) { return sc_phash_base::insert((void*) k, (void*) c); }
00183     int insert(K k) { return sc_phash_base::insert((void*) k, default_value); }
00184     int insert(K k, C c, void* (*kdup)(const void*)) { return sc_phash_base::insert((void*) k, (void*) c, kdup); }
00185     int insert_if_not_exists(K k, C c)
00186     {
00187         return sc_phash_base::insert_if_not_exists((void*) k, (void*) c);
00188     }
00189     int insert_if_not_exists(K k)
00190     {
00191         return sc_phash_base::insert_if_not_exists((void*) k, default_value);
00192     }
00193     int insert_if_not_exists(K k, C c, void* (*kdup)(const void*))
00194     {
00195         return sc_phash_base::insert_if_not_exists((void*) k, (void*) c, kdup);
00196     }
00197     int remove(K k) { return sc_phash_base::remove((const void*) k); }
00198     int remove(K k, K* pk, C* pc)
00199     {
00200         return sc_phash_base::remove((const void*) k, (void**) pk, (void**) pc);
00201     }
00202     int remove(K k, void (*kfree)(void*))
00203     {
00204         return sc_phash_base::remove((const void*) k, kfree);
00205     }
00206     int remove_by_contents(C c)
00207     {
00208         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents((const void*) c);
00209     }
00210     int remove_by_contents(bool (*predicate)(const void*, void*), void* arg)
00211     {
00212         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents(predicate, arg);
00213     }
00214     int remove_by_contents(const void* c, void (*kfree)(void*))
00215     {
00216         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents(c, kfree);
00217     }
00218     int remove_by_contents(bool (*predicate)(const void*, void*), void* arg, void (*kfree)(void*))
00219     {
00220         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents(predicate, arg, kfree);
00221     }
00222     int lookup(K k, C* pc) const
00223     {
00224         return sc_phash_base::lookup((const void*) k, (void**) pc);
00225     }
00226     bool contains(K k) const
00227     {
00228         return sc_phash_base::contains((const void*) k);
00229     }
00230     C operator[](K k) const
00231     {
00232         return (C) sc_phash_base::operator[]((const void*) k);
00233     }
00234 };

00237 template< class K, class C >
00238 class sc_phash_iter : public sc_phash_base_iter {
00239 public:
00240     sc_phash_iter(sc_phash<K,C>* t) : sc_phash_base_iter(t) { }
00241     sc_phash_iter(sc_phash<K,C>& t) : sc_phash_base_iter(t) { }
00242     ~sc_phash_iter() { }
00243 
00244     void reset(sc_phash<K,C>* t) { sc_phash_base_iter::reset(t); }
00245     void reset(sc_phash<K,C>& t) { sc_phash_base_iter::reset(t); }
00246 
00247     K key()      const { return (K) sc_phash_base_iter::key();      }
00248     C contents() const { return (C) sc_phash_base_iter::contents(); }
00249     C set_contents(C c)
00250     {
00251         return (C) sc_phash_base_iter::set_contents((void*) c);
00252     }
00253 };

00259 template< class K, class C >
00260 class sc_pdhash : public sc_phash_base {
00261     friend class sc_pdhash_iter<K,C>;
00262 
00263 private:
00264     void* (*kdup)(const void*); //eliminated braces around void* -- Amit
00265     void (*kfree)(void*);
00266 
00267 public:
00268     typedef sc_pdhash_iter<K,C> iterator;
00269     sc_pdhash( C def = (C) 0,
00270               int size    = PHASH_DEFAULT_INIT_TABLE_SIZE,
00271               int density = PHASH_DEFAULT_MAX_DENSITY,
00272               double grow = PHASH_DEFAULT_GROW_FACTOR,
00273               bool reorder = PHASH_DEFAULT_REORDER_FLAG,
00274               hash_fn_t hash_fn = (hash_fn_t) 0, // defaults added --
00275               cmpr_fn_t cmpr_fn = (cmpr_fn_t) 0, // Amit
00276               void* (*kdup_fn)(const void*) = 0,
00277               void (*kfree_fn)(void*)  = 0 )
00278         : sc_phash_base((void*) def, size, density, grow, reorder, hash_fn, cmpr_fn)
00279     {
00280         kdup = kdup_fn;
00281         kfree = kfree_fn;
00282     }
00283     ~sc_pdhash()
00284     {
00285         erase();
00286     }
00287     void erase()
00288     {
00289         sc_phash_base::erase(kfree);
00290     }
00291     void copy(const sc_pdhash<K,C>& b) { sc_phash_base::copy(b, kdup, kfree); }
00292     int insert(K k, C c) { return sc_phash_base::insert((void*) k, (void*) c, kdup); }
00293     int insert(K k) { return sc_phash_base::insert((void*) k, default_value, kdup); }
00294     int insert_if_not_exists(K k, C c)
00295     {
00296         return sc_phash_base::insert_if_not_exists((void*) k, (void*) c, kdup);
00297     }
00298     int insert_if_not_exists(K k)
00299     {
00300         return sc_phash_base::insert_if_not_exists((void*) k, default_value, kdup);
00301     }
00302     int remove(K k) { return sc_phash_base::remove((const void*) k, kfree); }
00303     int remove(K k, K* pk, C* pc)
00304     {
00305         return sc_phash_base::remove((const void*) k, (void**) pk, (void**) pc);
00306     }
00307     int remove_by_contents(C c)
00308     {
00309         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents((const void*) c, kfree);
00310     }
00311     int remove_by_contents(bool (*predicate)(const void*, void*), void* arg)
00312     {
00313         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents(predicate, arg, kfree);
00314     }
00315     int lookup(K k, C* pc) const
00316     {
00317         return sc_phash_base::lookup((const void*) k, (void**) pc);
00318     }
00319     bool contains(K k) const
00320     {
00321         return sc_phash_base::contains((const void*) k);
00322     }
00323     C operator[](K k) const
00324     {
00325         return (C) sc_phash_base::operator[]((const void*) k);
00326     }
00327 };

00329 template< class K, class C >
00330 class sc_pdhash_iter : public sc_phash_base_iter {
00331 public:
00332     sc_pdhash_iter(sc_pdhash<K,C>* t) : sc_phash_base_iter(t) { }
00333     sc_pdhash_iter(sc_pdhash<K,C>& t) : sc_phash_base_iter(t) { }
00334     ~sc_pdhash_iter() { }
00335 
00336     void reset(sc_pdhash<K,C>* t) { sc_phash_base_iter::reset(t); }
00337     void reset(sc_pdhash<K,C>& t) { sc_phash_base_iter::reset(t); }
00338 
00339     void remove() { sc_phash_base_iter::remove(((sc_pdhash<K,C>*) table)->kfree); }
00340     K key()      const { return (K) sc_phash_base_iter::key();      }
00341     C contents() const { return (C) sc_phash_base_iter::contents(); }
00342     C set_contents(C c)
00343     {
00344         return (C) sc_phash_base_iter::set_contents((void*) c);
00345     }
00346 };

00349 extern SC_API void sc_strhash_kfree(void*);
00350 extern SC_API void* sc_strhash_kdup(const void*);

00355 template< class C >
00356 class sc_strhash : public sc_phash_base {
00357     friend class sc_strhash_iter<C>;
00358 
00359 public:
00360     typedef sc_strhash_iter<C> iterator;
00361 
00362     sc_strhash( C def = (C) 0,
00363                 int size    = PHASH_DEFAULT_INIT_TABLE_SIZE,
00364                 int density = PHASH_DEFAULT_MAX_DENSITY,
00365                 double grow = PHASH_DEFAULT_GROW_FACTOR,
00366                 bool reorder = PHASH_DEFAULT_REORDER_FLAG,
00367                 unsigned (*hash_fn)(const void*) = default_str_hash_fn,
00368                 int (*cmpr_fn)(const void*, const void*) = sc_strhash_cmp )
00369         : sc_phash_base((void*) def, size, density, grow, reorder, hash_fn, cmpr_fn)
00370     {
00371 
00372     }
00373     ~sc_strhash()
00374     {
00375         erase();
00376     }
00377 
00378     void erase() { sc_phash_base::erase(sc_strhash_kfree); }
00379     void copy(const sc_strhash<C>* b) { sc_phash_base::copy(*b, sc_strhash_kdup, sc_strhash_kfree); }
00380     void copy(const sc_strhash<C>& b) { sc_phash_base::copy(b, sc_strhash_kdup, sc_strhash_kfree); }
00381 
00382     int insert(char* k, C c) { return sc_phash_base::insert((void*) k, (void*) c, sc_strhash_kdup); }
00383     int insert(char* k) { return sc_phash_base::insert((void*) k, default_value, sc_strhash_kdup); }
00384     int insert_if_not_exists(char* k, C c)
00385     {
00386         return sc_phash_base::insert_if_not_exists((void*) k, (void*) c, sc_strhash_kdup);
00387     }
00388     int insert_if_not_exists(char* k)
00389     {
00390         return sc_phash_base::insert_if_not_exists((void*) k, default_value, sc_strhash_kdup);
00391     }
00392     int remove(const char* k) { return sc_phash_base::remove((const void*) k, sc_strhash_kfree); }
00393     int remove(const char* k, char** pk, C* pc)
00394     {
00395         return sc_phash_base::remove((const void*) k, (void**) pk, (void**) pc);
00396     }
00397     int remove_by_contents(C c)
00398     {
00399         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents((const void*) c, sc_strhash_kfree);
00400     }
00401     int remove_by_contents(bool (*predicate)(const void*, void*), void* arg)
00402     {
00403         return sc_phash_base::remove_by_contents(predicate, arg, sc_strhash_kfree);
00404     }
00405     int lookup(const char* k, C* pc) const
00406     {
00407         return sc_phash_base::lookup((const void*) k, (void** )pc);
00408     }
00409     bool contains(const char* k) const
00410     {
00411         return sc_phash_base::contains((const void*) k);
00412     }
00413     C operator[](const char* k) const
00414     {
00415         return (C) sc_phash_base::operator[]((const void*) k);
00416     }
00417 };

00419 template<class C>
00420 class sc_strhash_iter : public sc_phash_base_iter {
00421 public:
00422     sc_strhash_iter ( sc_strhash<C>* t ) : sc_phash_base_iter(t) { }
00423     sc_strhash_iter ( sc_strhash<C>& t ) : sc_phash_base_iter(t) { }
00424     ~sc_strhash_iter() { }
00425 
00426     void reset ( sc_strhash<C>* t ) { sc_phash_base_iter::reset(t); }
00427     void reset ( sc_strhash<C>& t ) { sc_phash_base_iter::reset(t); }
00428 
00429     void remove() { sc_phash_base_iter::remove(sc_strhash_kfree); }
00430     const char* key()   { return (const char*) sc_phash_base_iter::key(); }
00431     C contents()  { return (C) sc_phash_base_iter::contents(); }
00432     C set_contents(C c)
00433     {
00434         return (C) sc_phash_base_iter::set_contents((void*) c);
00435     }
00436 };
